login_password_constraint: Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters, contain letters and numbers, and must not contain spaces, special characters or emoji.
login_forget_password: Forgot your password? Reset it here
login_fwd_subcription: New to Wa-llet? Sign up here
mobile_app_1: Send money from USA in minutes with the Wa-llet transfer app
mobile_app_2: With our brand new application, take advantage of secure transfers from the USA to Cameroon with ease.
mobile_app_3: Start with 3 FREE transfers. Download the Wa-llet app.
mobile_app_7: Join the millions of customers who trust Wa-llet to send their money from the USA
mobile_app_8: What's new in the Wa-llet application?
mobile_app_9: Send money in just a few clicks from USA to your phone
mobile_app_11: Significantly cheaper than most competitors, all our charges are quoted upfront for all your money transfers.
mobile_app_13: To make life easier for you and your beneficiaries, we offer mobile leaflet holders that are common and widespread throughout the region
mobile_app_15: The multilingual customer service team is available 24/7/365 to answer your questions.
mobile_app_16: Everything you need to know to transfer money from the USA with the app
mobile_app_18: With alerts on exchange rates, follow the evolution between Dollar and your favorite currencies directly in the Wa-llet money transfer application from USA thanks to daily notifications. Benefit from the best rates .
mobile_app_20: Transfer money from USA with the new Wa-llet money transfer app. More exciting features are coming soon.
mobile_app_22: More transfers with less effort. With the new fast forwarding feature, send money to your favorite beneficiaries from USA in just a few clicks.
mobile_app_23: A fast and efficient way to send money from the United States to Cameroon.
mobile_app_24: Download our free app to send money online to Cameroon in just a few minutes. Check your history from wherever you are
mobile_app_25: How to send money from the USA with Wa-llet
mobile_app_26: With the new Wa-llet application, choose how you want to send and receive your transfers for your loved ones from the USA.
mobile_app_28: Send money directly to a bank account. All you need is the recipient's information.
my_information_2: the information concerning your account is available below. For security reasons some of it is not visible

registration_text_2: Which country do you want to send money from?
registration_text_3: Your password must be at least 8 characters long, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number.
registration_text_4: Have you been recommended by a friend? Simply swipe the button and add the code they sent you.
